mapper.select: select * from codequestion where code_text = #{text} and source_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into codequestion (code_id, code_text, code_answer, code_parse, code_level, code_type, source_id) values (#{codeId}, #{codeText}, #{codeAnswer}, #{codeParse}, #{codeLevel}, #{codeType}, #{sourceId})
